channel.title: Errr how do i change the max lvl o.o im not a good coder :P
channel.description: title says it all but how do i change the max lvl like i think its in the player file but what do i search in their and change o.o?

item.title: Errr how do i change the max lvl o.o im not a good coder :P
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Search for this:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

Replace the whole thing with:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0; }

Read full topic
item.source: Errr how do i change the max lvl o.o im not a good coder :P
